title: Virtual Platform Microlearning Course for Arabic Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Arabic script and greeting-level proficiency
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate basic Arabic communication skills using personal mobile devices

learning_goals: Demonstrate everyday Arabic greetings with 80% accuracy.
Handwrite basic Arabic script (alphabet) with 90% accuracy.
Perform language exchange activities with peer learners over three times using interactive features in virtual platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
